summary: A beautiful, relaxing and cozy player home for everyone dedicated to my love.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/?]
[/url]                              [img]http://i68.tinypic.com/eja2aa.png[/img]
       [img]http://i67.tinypic.com/rj4g2w.jpg[/img]
       [img]http://i67.tinypic.com/kaps41.jpg[/img]
       [img]http://i67.tinypic.com/3132328.jpg[/img]
       [img]http://i65.tinypic.com/rmvi9y.jpg[/img]
       [img]http://i63.tinypic.com/35lf01s.jpg[/img]
       [img]http://i67.tinypic.com/5lugkl.jpg[/img]
       [img]http://i64.tinypic.com/27zdvt4.jpg[/img]
[font=Tahoma][size=5]This is a cozy player home for everyone, with working tables, custom storage containers, many bookshelfs and a beautiful exterior for relaxing.
Look at the last picture to know the location of the home.
It looks much better with various HD textures. For the trees I used [/size][/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38651/?][font=Tahoma][size=5]Hoddminir's Trees and Plants Recource.[/size][/font]
[/url]                                                 [youtube]oY3-N6OB_HQ[/youtube]
[font=Tahoma][size=5]This Mod requires [b][color=#ff0000][u]Dawnguard[/u][/color][/b] and the [b][color=#ff0000][u]Dragonborn[/u][/color][/b] because I used a few things from the DLC's, otherwise they won't be loaded or maybe the game will crash I don't know.

[color=#ff0000][u][b]Update 1.1[/b][/u][/color]
-adds a living room setted up for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/?]Hearthfire Multiple Adoptions [/url]with room for two
 kids and spouse (see the pictures);
-adds a smithing area (see the pictures);
-fixes the issue with items flying arround the interior when opening containers or
 doors, or even just entering the room;
-reduces greatly the interior lag by splitting the rooms into two cells;
[color=#ff0000][b][u]
Update 1.2[/u][/b][/color]
-a few bug fixes;
-fixes the bug with swimming NPC's in whiterun (this bug happens to appear with
 other mods too, even with no mods activated at all);
-adds a blacksmith merchant to the smithing area;[/size][/font]
author: Irmsad
